messages.content: Latest financial performance, quarterly results, and market sentiment for Microsoft. Include recent news and analyst opinions.

Microsoft's latest financial performance is as follows:

**Q2 2026 Financial Performance:**

* Earnings per share (EPS): $5.16
* Revenue: $81.3 billion, up 17% year-over-year
* Capital expenditures and finance leases: $37.5 billion, up 66% year-over-year
* Microsoft Cloud achieved a milestone, but specific details are not available
 [Source: https://msdynamicsworld.com/story/microsoft-2026-q2-earnings-growth-ai-cloud-and-business-apps-expenditures-rise](https://msdynamicsworld.com/story/microsoft-2026-q2-earnings-growth-ai-cloud-and-business-apps-expenditures-rise)
 [Source: https://www.cnbc.com/2026/01/28/microsoft-msft-q2-earnings-report-2026.html](https://www.cnbc.com/2026/01/28/microsoft-msft-q2-earnings-report-2026.html)

**Quarterly Results:**

Microsoft's Q2 2026 results exceeded analyst expectations, with an EPS of $4.14 beating the forecast by 5.34%. The company's revenue growth was driven by its cloud computing and AI businesses.

 [Source: https://www.investing.com/news/transcripts/earnings-call-transcript-microsoft-q2-2026-sees-strong-earnings-beat-stock-rises-93CH-4471700](https://www.investing.com/news/transcripts/earnings-call-transcript-microsoft-q2-2026-sees-strong-earnings-beat-stock-rises-93CH-4471700)

**Market Sentiment:**

Despite beating estimates, Microsoft's stock fell late in the trading session. Analysts polled by Visible Alpha had expected capital expenditures and finance leases to be lower than the actual $37.5 billion reported.

 [Source: https://www.investors.com/news/technology/microsoft-stock-msft-fiscal-q2-2026-earnings/](https://www.investors.com/news/technology/microsoft-stock-msft-fiscal-q2-2026-earnings/)

**Recent News and Analyst Opinions:**

* Microsoft returned $12.7 billion to shareholders in the form of dividends and share repurchases in Q2 2026.
* The company's strong earnings report led to a stock price increase, but the late decline in stock price may indicate some investor concerns.
* Analysts are generally positive on Microsoft's growth prospects in AI, cloud, and business applications.

 [Source: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/investor/earnings/fy-2026-q2/press-release-webcast](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/investor/earnings/fy-2026-q2/press-release-webcast)
 [Source: https://msdynamicsworld.com/story/microsoft-2026-q2-earnings-growth-ai-cloud-and-business-apps-expenditures-rise](https://msdynamicsworld.com/story/microsoft-2026-q2-earnings-growth-ai-cloud-and-business-apps-expenditures-rise)
